column2: What type of tire is the Potenza RE-71R?
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is a summer Extreme Performance tire.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is a summer High Performance tire.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R features NanoPro-Tech sidewall inserts.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is a Touring tire.
Which of the following best describes the Potenza RE-71R?
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is made for sports cars and luxury sedans.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is made for sports cars.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is made for economy cars.
Which technology in the Potenza RE-71R promotes effective drainage?
Which feature in the Potenza RE-71R provides extreme cornering performance?
Which technology in the Potenza RE-71R provides maximum contact and grip?
Which feature in the Potenza RE-71R promotes agile steering response?
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is an extreme all-season tire engineered for the street and the track.
True or False: The Hydro Evacuation Surface technology provides extreme cornering performance.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R incorporates the latest technologies to create a tire that has ultra-high performance handling with all the benefits of an Extreme Performance tire.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is not backed by Bridgestone’s 90 Day Buy & Try Guarantee.
True or False: The Potenza RE-71R is backed by Bridgestone’s 90 Day Buy & Try Guarantee.
True or False: The RE-71R is a street-legal tire that performs on both dry and wet roads while providing racetrack performance.
True or False: The Wide Center Rib feature promotes agile steering response.
